languages.text: "Про мир-столицу, пожалуй, говорить излишне? Потеряем ее — и станем посмешищем для других династий. Кроме того, утрата счетоводных записей и летописей грозит настоящей бюрократической катастрофой... Так что все три системы одинаково важны для протектората. И какую возвращать в первую очередь — решать только вам, мо{mf|й|я} Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Про мир-столицу, пожалуй, говорить излишне? Потеряем ее — и дадим понять нашим соперникам, насколько мы слабы. А уж в какие глубины скатится боевой дух команды, пожалуй, вы и сами догадываетесь. Так что все три системы одинаково важны для империи. И какую возвращать в первую очередь — решать только вам, мо{mf|й|я} Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Про мир-столицу, пожалуй, говорить излишне? Потеряем ее — и станем посмешищем для других династий. Кроме того, утрата счетоводных записей и летописей грозит настоящей бюрократической катастрофой... Так что все три системы одинаково важны для протектората. И какую возвращать в первую очередь — решать только вам, мо{mf|й|я} Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "I trust I do not have to explain the Capital World? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally important for the empire. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

"I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the empire. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

"I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the empire. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

"I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «Imagino que no necesito explicar la importancia del mundo capital. Perderlo nos convertiría en el hazmerreír de las demás dinastías y la pérdida de sus registros y crónicas supondría una hecatombe burocrática... Los tres sistemas son igualmente esenciales para el protectorado. Depende de usted decidir cuál devolver primero al redil, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}».
languages.original_text: "I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Imagino que no necesito explicar la importancia del mundo capital. Perderlo nos convertiría en el hazmerreír de las demás dinastías y la pérdida de sus registros y crónicas supondría una hecatombe burocrática... Los tres sistemas son igualmente esenciales para el protectorado. Depende de usted decidir cuál devolver primero al redil, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}».

languages.text: “至于首都世界的重要性，相信不需要我过多解释了吧？若是失去了首都世界，我们会成为其他王朝的笑柄。此外，若是弄丢了史册与账簿，我们的官僚体系会面临一场重大灾难……因此，这三个星系对我们的王朝而言同等重要。应该由您来决定先处理哪个星系的问题比较好，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “至于首都世界的重要性，相信不需要我过多解释了吧？若是失去了首都世界，我们会成为其他王朝的笑柄。此外，若是弄丢了史册与账簿，我们的官僚体系会面临一场重大灾难……因此，这三个星系对我们的王朝而言同等重要。应该由您来决定先处理哪个星系的问题比较好，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「首都惑星の説明は必要ありませんね？首都惑星を失えば、他の王朝の笑い者です。加えて年代記や台帳がなくなれば、官吏の仕事が大惨事になります…そういうわけで、保護領の3つの惑星はどれも等しく重要なのです。先にどの保護領へ行くかは陛下次第です、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「首都惑星の説明は必要ありませんね？首都惑星を失えば、他の王朝の笑い者です。加えて年代記や台帳がなくなれば、官吏の仕事が大惨事になります…そういうわけで、保護領の3つの惑星はどれも等しく重要なのです。先にどの保護領へ行くかは陛下次第です、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Zur Hauptwelt muss ich wohl nichts sagen, oder? Ihr Verlust würde uns zum Gespött der anderen Dynastien machen. Außerdem wäre es eine bürokratische Katastrophe, wenn wir keine Chroniken und Kassenbücher mehr hätten. Alle drei Systeme sind für das Protektorat gleichermaßen wichtig. Es bleibt Eure Entscheidung, Lord Captain, mit welchem wir uns vor den anderen befassen sollen."
languages.original_text: "I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Zur Hauptwelt muss ich wohl nichts sagen, oder? Ihr Verlust würde uns zum Gespött der anderen Dynastien machen. Außerdem wäre es eine bürokratische Katastrophe, wenn wir keine Chroniken und Kassenbücher mehr hätten. Alle drei Systeme sind für das Protektorat gleichermaßen wichtig. Es bleibt Eure Entscheidung, Lord Captain, mit welchem wir uns vor den anderen befassen sollen."

languages.text: « Quant au monde-capitale, j'imagine qu'il se passe d'explication. Il va sans dire que nous serions la risée des autres dynasties si nous le perdions, et je ne parle même pas de la catastrophe bureaucratique qu'entraînerait la disparition de tous les documents administratifs... En conclusion, ces trois mondes sont tout aussi importants les uns que les autres pour le protectorat. Il ne tient qu'à vous de choisir celui que nous devrions recouvrer en premier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Quant au monde capitale, j'imagine qu'il se passe d'explication. Il va sans dire que nous serions la risée des autres dynasties si nous le perdions, et je ne parle même pas de la catastrophe bureaucratique qu'entraînerait la disparition de tous les documents administratifs... En conclusion, ces trois mondes sont tout aussi importants les uns que les autres pour le protectorat. Il ne tient qu'à vous de choisir celui que nous devrions recouvrer en premier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Başdünyayı ise açıklamama gerek yoktur sanıyorum. Orayı kaybetmek, bizi diğer hanedanlıklara rezil rüsva eder. Ayrıca vakayinamelerle hesap defterlerinin kaybı, devasa bir bürokratik felaketi tetikler. Yani bu üç sistemin hepsi de protektoranız için eşit derecede hayati. Önce hangisinin saflarımıza çekilmesi gerektiğine karar vermek size kalmış Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "I trust I do not have to explain the capital world? Losing it would make us the laughing stock of the other dynasties. Besides, the loss of chronicles and ledgers would spell a bureaucratic catastrophe... So all three systems are equally vital to the protectorate. It falls to you to decide which should be brought into the fold before the rest, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Başdünyayı açıklamama bile gerek yok sanıyorum? Orayı kaybetmek diğer hanedanlıkların gözünde bizi rezil bir konuma düşürür. Ayrıca tarihçelerin ve hesap defterlerinin kaybı devasa bir bürokratik krize yol açar. Yani bu üç sistemin hepsi de protektoranız için eşit derecede hayati. Önce hangisinin saflarımıza çekilmesi gerektiğine karar vermek size kalmış Lord Kaptan."
